data.title: Blanche Diane Byrum

data.text:
Blanche Diane Byrum, 74, died at 12:27 p.m. Wednesday, July 3, 2024, at Fort Sanders Regional Hospital, Knoxville, Tenn.

She was born Nov. 23, 1949. On Dec. 31, 1967, she married Robert E. Sherrard Sr., who preceded her in death in 1989. On May 13, 1996, she married Hoyt Byrum, who survives.

She also is survived by her daughters, Elizabeth “Beth” Sherrard, Melbourne, Fla., Amy (William) Alberding, Warsaw, and Megan (Neil) Hodges, Syracuse; two stepchildren, Jennifer Meyer, Titusville, Fla., and Michael (Lauren) Byrum, Fort Wayne; sister, Kym (David) Arter, Melbourne, Fla.; and sister-in-law, Elaine Buhrmaster, Laurens, S.C.; seven grandchildren; three great-grandchildren; four step-grandchildren; one step-great-grandchild; a niece; a nephew; three great-nephews; one great-niece; and several cousins.
